markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thorned Seedpod](/Feats.aspx?ID=2396) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 43 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Seedpod](/Feats.aspx?ID=1041)

</column>

---

When your seedpods strike a felling blow, they burst into viciously thorny vines. When you critically succeed at a seedpod Strike, vines twist and stab your foe, dealing 1d4 [persistent piercing damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).
name: Thorned Seedpod
